1485200.name: The Vision
1485200.description:
Step into the world of The Vision, a vast and open universe where time travel and survival intertwine. Play as John, a time-traveling survivor navigating a rich multiverse filled with varied and hostile environments. The Vision offers both third and first-person view modes, providing players with a comprehensive and immersive experience.

Time travel is at the core of The Vision, allowing you to journey from the Mesozoic era to the very distant future. Each time period presents unique challenges and opportunities, from fending off dinosaurs to facing advanced alien civilizations. The world is pre-defined, ensuring a meticulously crafted experience with noticeable differences between eras while remaining within technical limitations.

Survival in The Vision is multifaceted. You will need to manage resources like money, weapons, food, and vehicles to stay alive. Typical survival mechanics such as inventory management, eating, and drinking are essential as you navigate through different periods. Base building adds another layer of strategy, allowing you to establish safe havens in the various timelines you explore.

The Vision focuses mainly on its storyline, offering a rich single-player and co-op narrative experience. Delve into intricate, ever-changing puzzles and compelling story arcs that draw you into the lives of the multiverse's inhabitants. Each discovery brings you closer to unraveling the world’s hidden layers and advancing John’s journey through time. Multiplayer elements are also included, but the heart of the game lies in its captivating story.

The game world of The Vision is heavily inspired by the rural landscapes of the American South. It features a detailed recreation of rural Georgia, including towns and cities based on real locations. This setting provides an authentic and immersive backdrop for your adventures, blending historical and futuristic elements seamlessly.

Features


  • Time Travel Adventures: Journey from the Mesozoic era to the distant future, each with unique challenges and environments.
  • Immersive Survival Mechanics: Manage your inventory, eat, drink, and conserve resources to survive across different time periods.
  • Base Building: Establish safe havens and build bases to protect yourself from various threats throughout the multiverse.
  • Dynamic Threats: Face zombies, aliens, and other hostile entities as you traverse diverse timelines.
  • Resource Management: Strategically manage items like money, weapons, food, and vehicles to navigate and survive in different eras.
  • Narrative-Driven Gameplay: Engage in a rich storyline with intricate puzzles and deep character interactions.
  • First and Third-Person Modes: Experience the game from different perspectives to fully immerse yourself in the world of The Vision.
  • Expansive Map: Traverse a large map that includes various towns, cities, and rural areas evolving over time. Explore other nations divided by bodies of water and even venture to different planets. The Vision is not a simulation, so space travel is not simulated, but the diverse locations offer endless exploration opportunities.
